OOC: Elections. *sigh* They sure can bring out the UGLY in people and 
at the same time they bring out some people's BETTER qualities!!

Let the best Bot win....

*****************************



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "Reconsturction complete." the computer stated. "Releasing new
> Decepticons." it again said. Both CR chambres opened, and inhumane
> growls could be heard from both. Then with heavy thuds, a large
> Mechanical horse stomped out, smoke protruding from where it's eyes
> should have been, and it's mouth. It bent down, so as to fit 
throught
> the rest of the chambre, and as it was out, unfolded large skeletal 
like
> wings, as it lifted it's front feet off the ground, then stomped 
them
> down, causing the ship to shake from the sheer weight. It contineud 
to
> spit up dust.
> 
> Then from the other chambre, a whirl of blue and red spun out at a
> lighting quick speed, landing on the wall. At and angle hanging off 
of
> the wall, an anamalistic growl began to laugh and cackle, it sounded
> like three different types of animals at once, and grated like glass 
on
> a chalk board. It was a mechanical Hyena, both eyes flaring blood 
red,
> as oil began to drip of it's razor sharp fangs, talons protruded
> everywhere, some were slicing into the wall as he laughed. He then 
leapt
> again to the ground, and paced around Longhaul, growling, his one 
eye,
> whirling in and out at the Constructicons.

::LONG HAUL::

    Long Haul's eyes creased into a pleased squint benind his face 
plate. The two robots in front of him seemed to sing with power and 
his stiffled a cheerful laugh. He enjoyed watching newly repaired 
robots emerge for the first time.
    "Well, well." he said. "Looks like everything turned out for the 
best for you two." He grunted. "And quit yer pacing..it's making me 
motion sick"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
